item.description:
The Bernadette's are playing at Captian's Cove http://www.captainsco... on the boardwalk. This is a can't miss event. We had a blast here last time so come join us and BRING A FRIEND!!

This is a Multi-Group Meetup with 4 other single groups so get ready to mix and mingle with other singles!

Get there early so you can mingle. Once the band starts will be on the deck dancing.

One of Fairfield County's HOT SPOTS for top entertainment!

Come meet friends and have a drink at our tugboat bar....or sit on our deck overlooking Historic Black Rock Harbor!

Enjoy delectable clams and oysters at our Weekend Raw Bar! (open from Memorial Day to Labor Day)Read more

There is a small fee of $1 for this event which we will collect using an honor system at the event. We love your company so please come and have a great time with us!!!

Hope to see you all there!




For over a decade, The Bernadettes have been providing memorable musical entertainment at a variety of events and functions including weddings, corporate events, private parties, and fund raisers. Rhythm & Blues, arguably America's finest and most well known export, is the music The Bernadettes specialize in performing. The very familiar toe-tapping sounds of Motown, the infectious dance grooves of Memphis soul shouters such as Wilson Pickett, the smooth, sophisticated Philly soul music of Earth, Wind & Fire, the hard driving funk-rock of Sly and the Family Stone, the soothing grooves of R&B crooners like Marvin Gaye and Bill Withers, and, of course, the unforgettable music of the king of soul, Mr. James Brown - this is the music The Bernadettes perform. Yes, they'll mix it up with a few modern contemporary dance hits here and there, a classic rock number, or an oldies favorite, but the emphasis is on the classic "old school" R&B music that American baby boomers have grown up with and folks of all ages have enjoyed dancing to for several decades. Check them out at their web site. http://jameskader.hom....

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Come Party with us @ Captian's Cove
